3: Boring! Boring! So boring! Nanami's bored!
Lucia! Lu~ci~a! What mission do you have? Take Nanami with you!
I do have a few missions on hand...
Then bring Nanami with you and Nanami will shining finger them all to death!
No, thank you. I can handle them on my own. You can remain on standby here at the base.
Awww! That's no fun! Lee, do you have anything for Nanami to do?!
I'm doing technical work, you're already helping by not coming over.
You think I'm a dingus, don't you! Nanami will have you know that her databanks are filled with superhuman levels of mechanical knowledge!
It's not a question of accrued knowledge, but the trouble that arises when you start attaching strange contraptions to every piece of equipment.
What do you mean 'strange contraptions'?! Nanami is enhancing the equipment!
You dare say that making things you can't control is enhancing?
Lee just didn't know how to use it.
Anyway, I don't need an extra pair of hands here! Go bother someone else.
I guess this leaves Liv... Liv?
I'm sorry, but my remaining task is taking care of the paperwork, which will probably be mundane.
Hm, that doesn't sound fun at all.
What should I do then? Nanami's going to rot in boredom!
Maybe I should just destroy the base.

4: There's got to be something else you can do!

3: Oh, Commandant, you're here.
Hm... I know! I won't destroy the base if... Commandant agrees to go on a date with Nanami!
Something else... wait, Commandant, you're here!

4: I've been standing behind you this whole time.

3: Hmm, the fact that Commandant only shows up at this hour means that Commandant has time to kill, just like Nanami!

2: I've got things to do in a bit.
4: I do have time to kill today.

3: I don't care. Commandant is going on a date with Nanami!
Then Commandant should go on a date with Nanami!
What?!
Is Commandant a ghost?!
How is that possible...
Commandant must know how bored Nanami is, because Commandant cares so deeply about Nanami! So, go out on a date with me!
How is that possible...
The Commandant must know how bored Nanami is, because Commandant cares so deeply about Nanami! So, go out on a date with me!
